faq.question: Does AI enhancement violate MLS photo rules?
faq.answer: No, AI enhancement improves existing photo quality without changing reality. It's equivalent to photo editing, which is standard practice. Avoid misrepresentation by not adding features that don't exist.

faq.question: How much can AI enhancement increase property value?
faq.answer: photos can help sell properties for 3-10% more. While AI doesn't directly add value, better presentation attracts more buyers and competitive offers.

faq.question: Can AI fix badly composed photos?
faq.answer: AI can improve quality but can't fix poor composition or lighting. start with well-composed photos and use AI to enhance, not rescue, bad shots.

faq.question: Is AI enhancement FDA approved for medical use?
faq.answer: AI enhancement tools are not FDA-approved for primary diagnosis. They're suitable for medical record documentation, telemedicine support, and educational purposes only.

faq.question: Can this replace medical imaging equipment?
faq.answer: No. AI enhancement improves existing image quality but cannot replace specialized medical imaging equipment like X-rays, MRIs, or CT scanners.

faq.question: How do you ensure patient privacy?
faq.answer: Use HIPAA-compliant processing, obtAIn patient consent, and ensure data encryption. Many healthcare providers use on-premise solutions for maximum privacy.

faq.answer: No. AI enhancement is a tool that automates repetitive tasks, allowing designers to focus on creative work. It's like having an assistant handle technical optimization while you do the design work.

faq.question: How does AI integration work with design software?
faq.answer: Most AI enhancement tools work alongside design software through drag-and-drop, plugins, or batch processing. You design, AI optimizes, then you finalize the creative work.

faq.question: Can AI handle complex design requirements?
faq.answer: AI excels at technical optimization (upscaling, enhancement) but requires designer guidance for creative decisions. Use AI for the technical parts, mAIntAIn creative control.

faq.question: What do I need for print media?
faq.answer: print typically requires 300 DPI. For large format printing, 150-200 DPI may be sufficient. AI enhancement can upscale to meet these requirements.

faq.question: Can AI enhancement fix poorly taken photos?
faq.answer: AI enhancement improves quality but can't fix fundamental issues like bad composition or focus. It works with reasonably composed photos that need quality improvement.

faq.question: How does AI enhancement comparison to photo editing services?
faq.answer: AI enhancement provides 70-90% of quality at 10% of the cost and time. services may still be needed for critical high-end publications.

faq.question: Can AI enhancement fix blurry action photos?
faq.answer: AI enhancement can improve moderately blurred photos but cannot fix completely out-of-focus images. It works on photos with decent initial capture quality.

faq.question: Does enhancement work for indoor fitness facility photos?
faq.answer: Yes, AI enhancement is excellent for improving indoor facility photos by enhancing lighting, reducing noise, and improving overall quality in challenging lighting conditions.
